metadata.name: Unveil Early Access Card
metadata.description: Acquire one of the 250 limited Early Access Cards for the Unveil, granting you a 24-hour advantage to purchase exclusive artworks before the general public. These cards are valid for multiple launch drops and offer cardholders a unique Discord role with access to a token-gated channel, as well as participation in exclusive community giveaways. Secure your card to enjoy a distinct opportunity to own renowned artists' works ahead of others.
